thread.section_title: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. | totallywicked-eliquid.com
thread.title: Ed Turco
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Ed Turco

author: Ed Turco
title: Ed Turco
text:
The refund for the returned items needs to be honest all of the time. I bought 5 items and didn't like the first one I opened. I was told that I could return all of them for a refund, provided that the opened item was resalable.
I was told that the opened item was not resalable, so I got a refund for the unopened 4. What bothers me is that Totally Wicked kept that item. Upon thinking about it, I was left with a bad taste in my mouth. With this policy, I was deprived of the use of the item which I paid for. I could have tried to salvage that one item for a friend, but no -- I am out over $40 instead!
Not a good feeling!
